name: Cricket Lanes
description: Professional cricket training lane with premium turf surface and full-length pitch.
rules: Check in at the reception desk before your session
Wear non-marking indoor cricket shoes only
Return all rented equipment after use
Complete the player waiver form before playing
notAllowed: Chewing gum inside the playing area
Knocking or playing in the seating area
Spike shoes, rubber spikes, or rail-type spikes
Players under the influence will be denied entry

name: Cricket Lane with Bowling Machine
description: Premium lane equipped with automated bowling machine for consistent practice sessions.
rules: Only authorized users may operate the bowling machine
Use only balls approved for bowling machine use
Do not exceed the machineâ€™s maximum speed and setting limits
Report any malfunction or damage immediately
allowed: Adjusting speed, line, and length using provided controls
Using approved indoor bowling machine balls
Coaching and performance training using the machine
Video recording for batting performance analysis
notAllowed: Tampering with internal components or opening the machine
Standing in front of the machine while it is active
Using damaged, wet, or unsuitable balls
Unauthorized repair, adjustment, or relocation of the machine
